title: Order a Future Lab Test
description: A physician wants a patient to have a follow-up lab test (e.g., A1c) done in three months. They need to place a future order.

tasks.description: Place an order for the A1c lab test.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician selects the correct lab test from the catalog.

tasks.description: Set the order to be 'Future' and specify the earliest date it can be drawn (e.g., three months from today).
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician correctly designates the order as a future lab draw.

tasks.description: Sign the order. The order will remain pending and will automatically activate on the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The future order is successfully placed and will become active at the appropriate time.
